amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for the equitable distribution of congressional gold medals under the bill between the majority and minority parties.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-1 to provide for an equitable distribution of gold medals under the bill between the majority party and the minority party.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 211 (Roll no. 11).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Crowley.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crowley amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 211 (Roll no. 11).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
